en.menuText:
[Warn] - The English version does not have complete translations

[1] - Clone everything to an existing server
[2] - Clone everything to a server the cloner will create
[3] - Clone everything to a server the cloner will create and generate a template
[5] - Account information
[6] - Server information by ID
[7] - Official Discord Server
